about_the_game:
"

FG Monster Kit Art Pack






The Monster Kit Art Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools.
This art pack consists of images that can be used to create humanoid monsters and creatures in a paper doll-style process. By combining heads, torsos, arms, legs, and many more parts you are able to make a vast array of creatures for whatever you might need. This pack includes the following items:





  • 4 maps of encounter locations for your creations


  • backgrounds for exporting your monsters in a more illustrative use


  • token frames and token backgrounds


  • 10 types of heads


  • 10 types of arms


  • 10 types of legs


  • 10 types of torsos


  • wings, tails, horns, and other images to further enhance your creations
"
detailed_description:
"

FG Monster Kit Art Pack






The Monster Kit Art Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools.
This art pack consists of images that can be used to create humanoid monsters and creatures in a paper doll-style process. By combining heads, torsos, arms, legs, and many more parts you are able to make a vast array of creatures for whatever you might need. This pack includes the following items:





  • 4 maps of encounter locations for your creations


  • backgrounds for exporting your monsters in a more illustrative use


  • token frames and token backgrounds
